channel.title: Can't login
channel.description:
Well, when I compile my server is say:
Successful! Press anywhere to continue...
But then when I try to log in with moparscape client, and I press Run.bat above the text that should say Blindscape Inialized! It says:
Java:48> at java.lang.Integer.parse.Int(Integer.java:458 And then t talks about the Npc handler, and the server.main and loadautpspawn
And when I try and log in, it brings up game then says "connection lost" and my host gets banned:
Banning Host localhost (flooding) ClientHandler: rejected localhost:1686
So I don't know why it won't work.
Thanks

item.title: Can't login
item.dc:creator: @Wilddar Wilddar
item.description:
@Wilddar wrote:

Well, when I compile my server is say:

Successful!
Press anywhere to continue…

But then when I try to log in with moparscape client, and I press Run.bat above the text that should say Blindscape Inialized! It says:

Java:48>
at java.lang.Integer.parse.Int(Integer.java:458
And then t talks about the Npc handler, and the server.main and loadautpspawn

And when I try and log in, it brings up game then says “connection lost” and my host gets banned:

Banning Host localhost (flooding)
ClientHandler: rejected localhost:1686

So I don’t know why it won’t work.

Thanks
